audioText: Nous devrons présenter nos résultats au conseil d'administration demain matin.
question: When will they present their results?
options: Tomorrow morning to the board of directors
Tomorrow afternoon to the board of directors
Next week to the board of directors
Tomorrow morning to the management team
explanation: The text states 'Nous devrons présenter nos résultats au conseil d'administration demain matin.' - We will have to present our results to the board of directors tomorrow morning. 'Devrons' is the 1st person plural future form of 'devoir' (must/have to).
